channel.title: [pi] Player owned shops [pi]
channel.description:
Hi i succesfully added player owned shops to my server it compiles fine etc but when i try to add an item to the shop i get this
[code][07/01/12 05:44]: [player-1]: Invalid waypoint in walking queue! [07/01/12 05:44]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 7390 [07/01/12 05:44]: at server.model.shops.ShopAssistant.sellToShopPrice(Shop Assistant.java:513) [07/01/12 05:44]: at server.model.players.packets.RemoveItem.processPacket (RemoveItem.java:74) [07/01/12 05:44]: at server.model.players.PacketHandler.processPacket(Pack etHandler.java:137) [07/01/12 05:44]: at server.model.players.Client.processQueuedPackets(Clie nt.java:1918) [07/01/12 05:44]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHand ler.java:149) [07/01/12 05:44]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:186)[/code]
then it DCs and reconnects its not a massive problem as i was just playing around with an old project of mine but if you have any suggestions they would be appreciated :-D
thanks
Tyco

item.title: [pi] Player owned shops [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Zosedan Zosedan
item.description:
@Zosedan wrote:

Use tabs in configuration files, not spaces.

Read full topic
